item.description:
Meet up with other like-minded Atheist people at Redline in Harvard square for dinner, drinks, and conversation.

Take this as a monthly chance to meet new people or catch up with your friends in the group.

Redline is a local bar in Harvard square with some tables set aside for us in the back room.

Definitely jump on the waiting list if you want to come! Spots always open up and we can usually work something out.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Winfield at the tables in back.
item.name: Atheist Social @ Redline
